<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LocVT == MVT::i64 &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> &lt; 6&#42;8)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="789" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sparctargetlowering/#a4ae582227faa40eda6e7066409e56596"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sparctargetlowering/#a4ae582227faa40eda6e7066409e56596">SparcTargetLowering::IsEligibleForTailCallOptimization</a>(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00795" /><CodeLine lineNumber="795"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do not tail call opt functions with &quot;disable-tail-calls&quot; attribute.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00796" /><CodeLine lineNumber="796"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Caller.getFnAttribute(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;disable-tail-calls&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">).getValueAsString() == </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;true&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00798" /><CodeLine lineNumber="798"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00799" /><CodeLine lineNumber="799"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do not tail call opt if the stack is used to pass parameters.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00800" /><CodeLine lineNumber="800"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 64-bit targets have a slightly higher limit since the ABI requires</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="801"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to allocate some space even when all the parameters fit inside registers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="802"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StackSizeLimit = Subtarget-&gt;is64Bit() ? 48 : 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00803" /><CodeLine lineNumber="803"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CCInfo.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccstate/#ac57dc1a949dd5e9d1d7aef280f2a26e5">getStackSize</a>() &gt; StackSizeLimit)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="804"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="805"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00806" /><CodeLine lineNumber="806"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do not tail call opt if either the callee or caller returns</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00807" /><CodeLine lineNumber="807"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a struct and the other does not.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="808"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Outs.empty() &amp;&amp; Caller.hasStructRetAttr() != Outs&#91;0&#93;.Flags.isSRet())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00809" /><CodeLine lineNumber="809"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00810" /><CodeLine lineNumber="810"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00811" /><CodeLine lineNumber="811"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Byval parameters hand the function a pointer directly into the stack area</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1171"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1172"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Fixup floating point arguments in the ... part of a varargs call.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1173"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1174"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The SPARC v9 ABI requires that floating point arguments are treated the same</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1175"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// as integers when calling a varargs function. This does not apply to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1176"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// fixed arguments that are part of the function&#39;s prototype.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1177"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1178"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This function post-processes a CCValAssign array created by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1179"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// AnalyzeCallOperands().</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1180" lineLink="#a4046c9ff3e500fb323f37cf298adc970"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a4046c9ff3e500fb323f37cf298adc970">fixupVariableFloatArgs</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;CCValAssign&gt;</a> &amp;ArgLocs,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1181"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;ISD::OutputArg&gt;</a> Outs) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1182"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccvalassign">CCValAssign</a> &amp;VA : ArgLocs) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1183"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt">MVT</a> ValTy = VA.getLocVT();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1184"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: What about f32 arguments? C promotes them to f64 when calling</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1185"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// varargs functions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1186"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!VA.isRegLoc() || (ValTy != MVT::f64 &amp;&amp; ValTy != MVT::f128))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1187"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1188"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The fixed arguments to a varargs function still go in FP registers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1189"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Outs&#91;VA.getValNo()&#93;.IsFixed)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1190"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1191"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1192"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This floating point argument should be reassigned.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1193"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Determine the offset into the argument array.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1194"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> firstReg = (ValTy == MVT::f64) ? SP::D0 : SP::Q0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1195"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> argSize  = (ValTy == MVT::f64) ? 8 : 16;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1196"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = argSize &#42; (VA.getLocReg() - firstReg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1197"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> &lt; 16&#42;8 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Offset out of range, bad register enum?&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1198"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1199"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> &lt; 6&#42;8) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1200"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This argument should go in %i0-%i5.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1201"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IReg = SP::I0 + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>/8;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1202"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ValTy == MVT::f64)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1203"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Full register, just bitconvert into i64.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1204"><span class="doxyHighlight">        VA = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccvalassign/#a29708e79e029f1029d46d65e7631b778">CCValAssign::getReg</a>(VA.getValNo(), VA.getValVT(), IReg, MVT::i64,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1205"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccvalassign/#a2b78fd53da0b5df7bc4eacf7df556a45a0f94adbbe71c94edaa533a25973bbffc">CCValAssign::BCvt</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1206"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1207"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(ValTy == MVT::f128 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Unexpected type!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1208"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Full register, just bitconvert into i128 -- We will lower this into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1209"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// two i64s in LowerCall&#95;64.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1210"><span class="doxyHighlight">        VA = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccvalassign/#a3213a94802bb4f87a3e388af6cdd9d7f">CCValAssign::getCustomReg</a>(VA.getValNo(), VA.getValVT(), IReg,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1211"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                       MVT::i128, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccvalassign/#a2b78fd53da0b5df7bc4eacf7df556a45a0f94adbbe71c94edaa533a25973bbffc">CCValAssign::BCvt</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1212"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1213"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1214"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This needs to go to memory, we&#39;re out of integer registers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1215"><span class="doxyHighlight">      VA = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccvalassign/#a36d9dd26dea75ebba5b55516b52e0752">CCValAssign::getMem</a>(VA.getValNo(), VA.getValVT(), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1216"><span class="doxyHighlight">                               VA.getLocVT(), VA.getLocInfo());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1217"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1218"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1219"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1220"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1221"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Lower a call for the 64-bit ABI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1222"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a></span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1224"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;SDValue&gt;</a> &amp;InVals)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1241"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The stack offset computed by CC&#95;Sparc64 includes all arguments.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1242"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Called functions expect 6 argument words to exist in the stack frame, used</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1243"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// or not.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1244"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StackReserved = 6 &#42; 8u;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02778" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2778"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// at the bottom of the stack.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2779"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> regSpillArea;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02780" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2780"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Subtarget-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sparcsubtarget/#aa8302f5e3165c69b082f18b56abf8a6b">is64Bit</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2781"><span class="doxyHighlight">    regSpillArea = 128;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2782"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02783" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2783"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// On Sparc32, the size of the spill area is 92 Unfortunately,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02784" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2784"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that&#39;s only 4-byte aligned, not 8-byte aligned (the stack</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2785"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// pointer is 8-byte aligned). So, if the user asked for an 8-byte</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2786"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// aligned dynamic allocation, we actually need to add 96 to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2787"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bottom of the stack, instead of 92, to ensure 8-byte alignment.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2788"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2789"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// That also means adding 4 to the size of the allocation --</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02790" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2790"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// before applying the 8-byte rounding. Unfortunately, we the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2791"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// value we get here has already had rounding applied. So, we need</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02792" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2792"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to add 8, instead, wasting a bit more memory.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02793" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2793"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02794" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2794"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Further, this only actually needs to be done if the required</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02795" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2795"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// alignment is &gt; 4, but, we&#39;ve lost that info by this point, too,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02796" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2796"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// so we always apply it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02797" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2797"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02798" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2798"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (An alternative approach would be to always reserve 96 bytes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02799" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2799"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instead of the required 92, but then we&#39;d waste 4 extra bytes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02800" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2800"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in every frame, not just those with dynamic stack allocations)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2801"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2802"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: modify code in SelectionDAGBuilder to make this less sad.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02803" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2803"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2804"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> = DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#abad5b17501ce8972fb04a149611e7177">getNode</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a269996b43a1f3e1d1f84a70fd4387535">ISD::ADD</a>, dl, VT, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2805"><span class="doxyHighlight">                       DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#a7d26e2f2179b5a8a53381f8046e9d117">getConstant</a>(8, dl, VT));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02806" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2806"><span class="doxyHighlight">    regSpillArea = 96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02807" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2807"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2808"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02809" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2809"><span class="doxyHighlight">  int64&#95;t Bias = Subtarget-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sparcsubtarget/#a0ecd5e4ac0477e60d25858e8c758a669">getStackPointerBias</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02810" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2810"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02811" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2811"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Debias and increment SP past the reserved spill area.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02812" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2812"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We need the SP to point to the first usable region before calculating</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02813" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2813"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// anything to prevent any of the pointers from becoming out of alignment when</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02814" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2814"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we rebias the SP later on.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02815" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2815"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> StartOfUsableStack = DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#abad5b17501ce8972fb04a149611e7177">getNode</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02816" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2816"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a269996b43a1f3e1d1f84a70fd4387535">ISD::ADD</a>, dl, VT, SP, DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#a7d26e2f2179b5a8a53381f8046e9d117">getConstant</a>(regSpillArea + Bias, dl, VT));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02817" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2817"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> AllocatedPtr =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02818" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2818"><span class="doxyHighlight">      DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#abad5b17501ce8972fb04a149611e7177">getNode</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a9fa617e5567c3c2638938f7b9ddc3f1c">ISD::SUB</a>, dl, VT, StartOfUsableStack, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02819" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2819"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02820" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2820"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsOveraligned = MaybeAlignment.has&#95;value();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02821" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2821"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> AlignedPtr =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02822" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2822"><span class="doxyHighlight">      IsOveraligned</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02823" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2823"><span class="doxyHighlight">          ? DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#abad5b17501ce8972fb04a149611e7177">getNode</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110ac513a7da1bf74fb3e3c594da8534f2d2">ISD::AND</a>, dl, VT, AllocatedPtr,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02824" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2824"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#a8a2567d305d0f9929660220a4d6f916a">getSignedConstant</a>(-MaybeAlignment-&gt;value(), dl, VT))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02825" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2825"><span class="doxyHighlight">          : AllocatedPtr;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02826" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2826"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02827" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2827"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now that we are done, restore the bias and reserved spill area.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02828" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2828"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> NewSP = DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#abad5b17501ce8972fb04a149611e7177">getNode</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a9fa617e5567c3c2638938f7b9ddc3f1c">ISD::SUB</a>, dl, VT, AlignedPtr,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02829" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2829"><span class="doxyHighlight">                              DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#a7d26e2f2179b5a8a53381f8046e9d117">getConstant</a>(regSpillArea + Bias, dl, VT));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02830" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2830"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Chain = DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#a155ffe05aa8e1991b486a7f96ff2e828">getCopyToReg</a>(SP.getValue(1), dl, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvframelowering-cpp/#a0e92b710da2e75e063fee5f7efb8f21e">SPReg</a>, NewSP);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02831" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2831"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/demangle/itaniumdemangle-h/#a926d7ce2143863b7a2afda0fca4d2b65">Ops</a>&#91;2&#93; = &#123;AlignedPtr, Chain&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02832" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2832"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#a193d4ea30b27a0c86550ae249eefaeaa">getMergeValues</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/demangle/itaniumdemangle-h/#a926d7ce2143863b7a2afda0fca4d2b65">Ops</a>, dl);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2833"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02835" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2835"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3257"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To &quot;insert&quot; a SELECT&#95;CC instruction, we actually have to insert the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3258"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// triangle control-flow pattern. The incoming instruction knows the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3259"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// destination vreg to set, the condition code register to branch on, the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3260"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// true/false values to select between, and the condition code for the branch.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3261"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3262"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We produce the following control flow:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3263"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     ThisMBB</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3264"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     |  \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3265"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  //     |  IfFalseMBB</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3266"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     | /</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3267"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    SinkMBB</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3268"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;LLVM&#95;BB = BB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#a4874816314c3308be0bf1e71de2078d8">getBasicBlock</a>();</span></CodeLine>
